Back to Franz Liszt

Franz Liszt

Magyar Király-dal (Ungarisches Königslied), S. 544

1883 · LW A328 · R. 215

[IMSLP]

This is an arrangement of a song for voice and piano (S. 340; LW N81; R. 636). Liszt also made arrangements for choir (with and without orchestra) (S. 93; LW L16), voice and orchestra (S. 370a), orchestra (S. 112f) and piano duet (S. 626; LW B60; R. 345).

Recommended editions

  • New Liszt Edition (Editio Musica Budapest) · I/17 · Z. A/B 8860 · Piano Versions of His Own Works III · ed. Imre Mező / Imre Sulyok
  • New Liszt Edition (Editio Musica Budapest) · Suppl. 8 · Z. A/B 14503 · ed. Adrienne Kaczmarczyk / Ágnes Sas [album leaf]

Duration: 4' 30"

Difficulty: 3
